user_personas.name: Emma
behaviors: Spends time on Instagram and Pinterest for home decor inspiration
Researches products extensively for materials, origins, and styling advice
pain_points: Frustrated with mass-produced furniture lacking character and quality
Many e-commerce sites have low-quality images and minimal product details
Difficulty visualizing items in her space
Concerns about integrity of small online businesses and unclear return policies
needs: Platform with high-quality, detailed product imagery and accurate descriptions

user_personas.name: Daniel
behaviors: Trend-aware shopper keeping up with interior design trends
Seeks specific art or furniture pieces to complete rooms
pain_points: Overwhelmed by too many options on large marketplaces
Concerns about shipping and delivery, especially for larger items
needs: Mobile-friendly platform with curated product selection
Confidence in delivery logistics for large furniture items

user_stories.story: I want to see high-quality images from multiple angles so that I can be confident the item will look right in my space.
acceptance_criteria: Product detail pages must have a dedicated image gallery
Image galleries must include zoom functionality

user_stories.story: I want to easily message customer support to ask about custom options so I can purchase a product tailored to my needs.
acceptance_criteria: A prominent 'Contact Us' or 'Message Support' button is on the product detail page
Messages are threaded and accessible from the user's dashboard

user_journeys: User lands on the Homepage featuring curated products
Browses a collection and clicks on a coffee table
Navigates to the Product Detail Page for the table, uses the image zoom
Sees 'In Stock' to confirm the wood type is available
Adds the item to the cart and proceeds to checkout
Enters shipping information, sees the calculated freight shipping cost, pays, and receives confirmation
